title: Create Gift Cards and Referral Page for Donor
description:
### **Summary :**

I am looking to get frontend developer to make gift cards page

The task include :

1. List of gift card page
2. Select gift card page
3. Buy gift card (can direct to available page /quick-donate-gift)
4. Referrals page
5. Referrals / Share page

The details of UI behavior will refers to the attachment files.

### Technology stack will use:

1. NextJS MUI v5

2. Typescript

3. Theme template : Minimal UI Kit TypeScript

4. Internalization [https://react.i18next.com/](https://react.i18next.com/) (languages: English, Arabic)`

5. Automated UI testing with Jest + React Testing Library ([https://testing-library.com/docs/react-testing-library/intro/](https://testing-library.com/docs/react-testing-library/intro/))

6. Styling must not use plain CSS files, but use one or combination of:

- Ad-hoc simple styling: MUI v5 `sx` prop ([https://mui.com/system/the-sx-prop/](https://mui.com/system/the-sx-prop/))
- Component-based styling: MUI v5 `styled` (https://mui.com/system/styled/)

7. Animation library : Framer motion

### **The deliverable :**

1. UI screen as reference will be displayed in attachments or live preview link below
2. UI must be responsive
3. Must have automated tests (using Jest + RTL) for given scenarios
4. UI must have animation for key interactions
5. UI must must be Internalization [https://react.i18next.com/](https://react.i18next.com/) (languages: English, Arabic)
- check this for internationalization
    
    [https://www.notion.so/hendyirawan/Internationalization-Localization-Policy-318c21674e5f44c48d6f136a6eb2e024](https://www.notion.so/Internationalization-Localization-Policy-318c21674e5f44c48d6f136a6eb2e024)
    

### Figma

Complete figma UI will be given after contract start.

title: Files APIs - Lambda Functions
description:
I’m looking for someone that can build out an AWS Lambda Function using the Serverless Framework.

The API that we need your help with: All of the File APIs
Listed in this sheet
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1xTp-cJqRf3jbra2O-OYDXoe4Eopjdon6/edit#gid=1078487118

Here's additional information to reference as you build them, these are the other APIs we're building at the same time you will be building the file APIs
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1MMT45wp8xGoxmGa83BHx0C5YO7VyX7n1

These File APIs need to be completed in the next 24 hours. 


We’re building an API-as-a-service layer that provides Developers with a REST API they can use to access and interface with accounts & smart contracts on the blockchain. This enables Developers to integrate the blockchain into their applications without needing to know how to build or deploy Smart Contracts, Manage Tokens, Permissions, etc.

Tech Stack:
NodeJS
Serverless Framework
AWS API Gateway
AWS Lambda
AWS Step Functions
DynamoDB
AWS SQS
AWS SNS/SES

You:
- Have AWS & Serverless experience
- Can create a LucidChart diagram to explain what we’re building
- Are available to start TODAY :)

Please refer the the below attached API documentation and develop an AWS Lambda function using NodeJs and configure it with AWS API Gateway api endpoint. The details about the API function have been given below which includes request, response, type, auth and code details.  
Please make sure that the API function matches all the details given below.
1.      Request param validation if any.
2.      Response data structure and accuracy of data.
3.      Proper success and error code in the response.
4.      Make sure the data is stored/retrieved/deleted properly in/from the DynamoDB.
5.      If there are any inter dependent API call/Transaction API call or logic then please do not forget to add or ask questions if you have any doubt.

Please start your Proposal with the word "NICE"

title: Senior Software Engineer (NFT / Blockchain)
description:
MUST BE LOCATED IN NORTH AMERICA, EUROPE, SOUTH AMERICA TO BE CONSIDERED

 

 

Why Consider This?

 

NFT is a growing and emerging market! Sales volume reached $2.5 Billion in the first 
half of 2021, up from $13.7 million in the first half of 2020. 
 
Smart people / capital and the best brands are all in, from Andreessen Horowitz to 
the NBA!

and deliver NFT solutions to enterprise companies that are fast, reliable, and have a 
global impact. 
 
Partnering with the best platforms and companies in the world to craft NFT solutions 
that can have a global impact on millions of lives.

    developing every team member. The Founder and team will work closely with this person

Requirements: 

    5+ years’ exp. in software engineering + B.S. in Computer Science or equivalent work exp.
    Ability to architect high performance / high load back ends
    Capable of implementing and optimizing microservices

Nice to Haves: 

    Experience as a freelancer / business owner
    Experience working on Blockchain projects
    Understanding of Docker and knowledge of CI / CD pipeline configuration
    Worked with AWS, architected and implemented a serverless system from the ground up

WHO YOU ARE

    Focus on authenticity with everything you do.
    Entrepreneurial (Strives to reach potential, maximum impact, growth mindset)

    Ability to Work Effectively Independently or as a Team

title: Build Customized Pages on Existing Website
description:
Upwork: Project Scope - Website Update 
Feb 27, 2022
www.binibi.co

Context
Binibi is a bilingual education and entertainment company that makes products for children 0-3. One of our biggest initiatives for the year is to launch a content hub and provide resources for parents. Our current website does not support that functionality, and I need a Shopify Expert to help me create the page. 

Requirements for Candidates:
Knowledge of Shopify and how to customize pages (Shopify Expert preferred)
Ability to work with set timelines 
Ability to communicate effectively 
Ability to complete project in 2 weeks.

Requirement:
Add a page on our existing Shopify website that enables us to provide resources for users to download. 

Example: https://slumberkins.com/pages/caregiver-resources?tab=

title: Build demo/POC for point and click adventure in Unity 3D
description:
Project is to build a demo/POC level in Unity (3D and 2D) for Windows.  Non-essentials such as theme, style, story, etc. can be discussed at your discretion.  Project is two distinct phases.

Phase 1:  Purpose of phase 1 is to build a crude 3D version of the level with the intent to iterate and “find the fun” in the design.  Focus on camera angles and timing the quick time events will be key.  Ultimate goal is to serve as a living story board for an animator.

•	Using assets from the Unity asset store (at my expense and choice), build a 3D ranch style level using the layout of my crude drawings.  This includes finding and importing character and enemy models.
•	Build player character and enemy paths and branches that take them down different rails depending on player choice via QTE’s.
•	Teach me how to modify camera angles and event timing to reduce your required labor.

Phase 1 is successful when “fun” iterations are complete, level is fully playable, and camera work is finished, insofar as it is within your ability to control (i.e. you’ve set it up to my basic asks and taught me how to manipulate).  Since I’m asking that I be involved in the camera work I will not hold you liable for any extended period if I decide to continue to play with the camera.

Phase 2:  This phase will commence after animation is complete on a separate contract.  The purpose of this phase is to apply the scripting and interactivity learned from Phase 1 to the animated frames.  Since it will be animated, this will take place in 2D and there will be no rails to follow, only getting from one frame to the next.

Phase 2 is successful when the animated 2D version of the level is fully playable.

I imagine most of the heavy lifting is done in Phase 1 so ¾ of the contract will be front loaded to that phase.  We can discuss milestones together, though, and even break into two contracts if agreed upon.

title: (MVP) Node.js Developer with Twillio API experience
description:
Hi there!

I'm looking for a node.js developer who has previously built apps using Twilio. This MVP is all backend - no front end will be needed. It should be deployed on AWS and written in TypeScript.

Requirements: 
 1. Set up a Twillio phone number
2. When the number is dialed, prompt the caller for their 4 digit pin. If the phone number isn't in the database, prompt them to set a Pin.
3. If the Pin matches the caller's phone number (or they've just set it), then the caller is able to "leave a message" using the Twillio Record API
4. After the caller finishes their message and hangs up, the recording audio file gets uploaded to an S3 bucket and an SMS gets sent to my phone number (to be provided)
5. Then, when I call the same Twilio number, prompt me for my 4 digit pin (which can be hardcoded) - then start playing the messages in order.
 6. Then, I want to be able to respond to the caller with either an SMS or another voice call that gets recorded. After the SMS is sent or my voice message is uploaded to S3, the caller's original message gets deleted from S3.
 7. After this, the caller should be notified by SMS that they have a voice message ready for them. They can then call the Twilio number and listen to the message. After they do so, my message should also be deleted from S3.

Please submit a timeline or ask any questions so you're able to provide a timeline to develop the MVP

More work on this project to follow after this initial MVP.

Thanks and I look forward to hearing from you!

title: ETH Token + Breeding for NFT
description:
Hello, I am looking for someone who can help me create a breeding system for my already existing NFT project. Furthermore there should also be a token made called $bearries. 
- The project is on IMX and the way the "staking" will work is by checking whether a user has the NFT listed on the marketplace or not. If it is not listed, the user will accumulate 10 $bearries / day pr NFT not listed. 

Furthermore a new collection should be made for the breeding system. The NFTs for the new collection can be bought for 300 $bearries / pr nft. 

- Once someone has enough $bearries (earned through staking), they should be able to 'mint' a new nft with their earned bearries. Since we call this mechanism 'breeding' the person should also own atleast 2 of the parent NFT to do so. Once they submit their breeding, their $bearries tokens will be burned/ or sent to an admin wallet and they will receive a new version of the NFT.

5.2 We need to change the system so that we use Helcim to charge Crowdfunders via credit card when they crowdfund an eCommerce site.

5.3 Update the system to reflect the new way of charging Merchants via ACH Deduction from user's bank account every time a sale is made.

5.4 We also need to keep 2.5% from the crowdfunder's sales commission and send that to Go Fish Admin Dashboard to a new balance called ""Go Fish Crowdfunder Fee Balance""; the rest goes to crowdfunder. For example, if crowdfunder is to earn 20%, we keep 2.5% and 17.5% goes to Crowdfunder. "
"3.2 We need to recognize each time if 100% of the crowdfunding funds are paid back by 9 months, and if not, the [REMAINING AMOUNT] must be divided by [90] and that amount must be taken out of their bank account via ACH on a daily basis until 100% is fully paid back. 
For example, if at the 9 month point there is 1,000 remaining, then we need to take 1,000 / 90 = $11.11 and once the days remaining are 80, then the remaining amount must be divided by 80 and paid back as such, and same when it is 70 days remaining, ect.
This needs to re-calculate every day, because sales will still occur and offset the balance, so the re-calculation must re-occur daily.
 (This same thing should happen each time a Crowdfunder crowdfunds an eCommerce site)"

title: Build an e-commerce API that aggregates other e-commerce APIs into one
description:
### Details of the project:

Example competitor: [https://api2cart.com/](https://api2cart.com/)

The project will need to aggregrate different e-commerce APIs under one API. The APIs I would like to aggregate are:

- Shopify
- Magento
- Amazon
- WooCommerce
- Squarespace
- Ebay
- Etsy
- Wix

These are my top priorities for now, with more coming down the pipeline in the future.

The API will allow customers to manage their different stores that they have connected to the API, all using a single set of API calls which will then call the appropriate 3rd party e-commerce APIs that they have connected their store to.

I need someone to help make the backend for me. So far I have a FastAPI Python backend written up with calls to shopify and magento product APIs. There isn’t very much there I just wanted to prove the concept. I will be available to help with some of the backend work, but would like to put my focus on the frontend part of the project. 

### Requirements

I would like the backend to be python, and I would like the API to be completely documented with OpenAPI specification. I would also like there to be tests to cover all the major portions of the API. The API should include authentication as well.

### Use Case

Someone like [https://www.prosku.com/](https://www.prosku.com/) creates an account with our app, and is then able to add different stores to our database, with each store having at least 1 connection to one of the 3rd party ecommerce apps.

Please let me know if you have any questions or if a project like this would interest you and we could move further with negotiating some of the details.

title: Simple E-Commerce Full Stack App
description:
Attached you will find an informative video in addition to a PDF file that will enable you to understand our specifications and vision for this project. At a high level, we will:

– Enable users to go onto a custom app, submit images, and purchase tickets. These tickets enable them to take part in a rideshare program on a real rocket.
– Images uploaded will be stored on a cloud drive, sorted to remove anything in appropriate, then be downloaded onto an SD card
– The SD card will be sent to the rocket launch company for placement onto the rocket.
– Students will be able to participate for free and we have a promotional code generation system for that we'll need as well

Once all of the tickets are sold, we'll need an automated way to create a mosaic of all of the uploaded photos, enabling users to zoom in and navigate/search everything that was sent.

We are anticipating tens of thousands of images, if not hundreds of thousands. That said, the cloud storage drive must be able to support this load. There also needs consideration around how the mosaic will be created.

Budget submitted is initial and we're open to bids and even expanding the budget for the right development partner.

This job must be complete and launched by March 19th at the latest. We have a must-meet date.

title: URL Shortner Installation and Redirection
description:
I have a url shortner script that I purchased.  I want to set it up and I also need someone to help create a URL Redirection PHP script that will trigger on the event below:

When user click the first shorturl, it will redirect them to web link 1, before it redirects, it will check wherever weblink 1 passed Google Safe Browsing test. If it passes, it will redirect to weblink 1. If it fails Google safe browsing test, it will check web link 2 and if it passed, it will redirect to web link 2,  If weblink 2 failed Google safe browsing test, the original domain will again try to redirect to weblink 3…. I want to preset up to 5 redirection.  

I want the redirection UI be merged with the URL shortner UI. 

If you believe you can do this project or have any question , please message me and I will send you the URL Shortner script.

iOS system
iOS or any operating system (in English: iOS) (known in its beginnings as iPhone OSX, OSX iPhone and its previous official name until June 7, 2010 is: iPhone operating system or iPhone OS) is an operating system that appeared in the beginning of 2007 As an operating system that Apple made for its iPhone, later, it became the default system for the iPod touch and the iPad tablet with a modified version of the interface measurements for the latter. The system is one of the operating systems that are part of the Mac OS X family.

From the launch of the system in 2007 until October 2012, 400 million iOS devices have been sold worldwide, ranging from iPod touch, iPhone and iPad, and 230,000 new iOS devices are activated daily

title: Hiring Senior Engineer - PHP - 3month contract - India only

Role Overview

We are seeking an experienced, motivated Senior Engineer (SE)/Engineer (E) - PHP to join our Platform Application Services (PAS) team.

The SE/E is a skilled and experienced software developer responsible for the detailed design, implementation, and testing of subsystems and system components. A SE/E is able to build a wide variety of software subsystems and components efficiently and effectively, given only a requirements specification and constraints. A SE/E is able to develop and maintain these subsystems and software components in complex, multi- vendor, multi-platform environments.

	Interact with technical team, technical lead, business analysts and project managers to understanding project requirement & and technical requirements
	Design and document applications and its various modules.

title: Need Google Ads script that uses UrlFetchApp to retrieve change instructions from external web page
description:
I have basic PHP skills and know some Javascript, but I'm unable to figure out the syntax of passing a request from a Google Ads script using UrlFetchApp to a web page and then retrieve the response. 

I need someone to write 2 simple scripts, a UrlFetchApp script I’ll place in Google Ads  Scripts that sends a request to a web page, and a script I’ll place on that web page to return the requested data back to the Google Ads script. The basic goal here is to retrieve data from the web page on whether to pause or enable an ads campaign.

Here’s a rough idea of what I’m thinking:

1. UrlFetchApp script (Google Ads Scripts)
	- Sends 2 variables to web page via POST

2. Web page
	- Receives 2 POSTed variables
	- Returns 2 variables

3. UrlFetchApp script (Google Ads Scripts)
	- Receives 2 variables from web page

I’ve attached the two files (urlfetchapp_script.js and return_fetch_data.php) where I need the scripts with further instructions commented in each file. 

NOTES: I don’t want anything fancy with these scripts, just something simple that works. Once I have something that can pass data back and forth, I’ll take care of the rest.

I can’t give access to the Google Ads account or the website, so I need someone who can do this and test it in their own environment.

--
Upwork wouldn't allow me to upload the return_fetch_data.php file so I had to take a screenshot of it instead (see return_fetch_data.png). Thanks for understanding!

title: Data Cleaning Scripts with Python / Bash
description:
We have a number of scripts for cleaning data, and are looking to have them written in a format that is very clean (DRY), and well documented. 

Script 1 = Combine files + Field Normalization
- We have a folder of XLSM, XLS and CSV files that are very similar, but sometimes have different headers or headers out of order.
- For the DATE fields, we have to normalize it. Sometimes it is YY-MM-DD and sometimes it is YYYY-DD-MM.
- Sometimes it may have DATE + TIME, and these need to be split into two separate fields.
- Script should be relatively robust and can catch most easy/obvious ETL like tasks.
- We should trim, remove "." etc.

Script 2 = Clean up names
We have a list of names and misspellings that looks like this
DEVO CORP. ➜ DEVO CORP
DEVO CORPORATION ➜ DEVO CORP
DEVO CRPRATION ➜ DEVO CORP
We have a master table with about 1000 misspelings in EXCEL. We should store this as an SQLite database. 
- Script should check all names against the SQLite, and create a new field fieldname_normalized and flag.
- Flag is anything we missed (we have to keep a running list of misspellings, cannot use fuzzy matching)

Script 3 = Geocoding

- Once that's done, we will have to do some address normalization using Google's Geocoder
We should store the PLACES_ID and return in a new set of fields how GOOGLE LISTS THE ADDRESS. They are the best with misspellings, etc.
- add fields LATITUDE_GOOGLE and LONGITUDE_GOOGLE

I will provide more specific instructions as we get started. We are looking for a reliable resource to help us out for the long run!

title: Integrate Tulip Manufacturing Software and app buildout
description:
I am looking for someone who knows how to use Tulip manufacturing software and who can customize the apps and software to work for our food manfuacturing business. Our goal is to transition all of these current practices to Tulip and also work with someone to make improvements for this software as we find areas to improve. 

1. Inventory Management - MRP 
Material planning for an order - basically if we need to produce 10,000 bottles of something I would like to have a formatted page similar to the google doc that has the formula percentages and a total batch weight box we can adjust to see how many ingredients we need to buy and also how much we have on hand as well.
  Ingredient check in - I want to almost duplicate their ingredient check in process where we can add check boxes on the form for QC to complete testing and other checks, upload the COA, and automatically print the barcode for that ingredient when they hit approve. 
Ingredient location with barcode labels for pallets (not something we need right away)
2. Electronic Batch Records 
Ingredient use allocation and bar code verification - Basically if we have 3 lots of an ingredient we want the ability to prioritize ingredients first in first out so if the operator scans the barcode as they add into the batch, we want it to give them a green light if correct or red if it's wrong and then also automatically add the lot code on that ingredient to the batch record
Batch Review page where QC can review the yield, document other quality checks, create COA (certificate of analysis), and approve product release
Spec sheet and other special instructions
Quality check list 
3. Quality Management System 
Sanitation procedures for each production run (right now this is on our master production record)
Routine sanitation and maintenance that has to be done on a monthly basis or bi monthly - We would like the ability to automatically schedule tasks/ processes to come open on like a workbench kanban that the production workers can see everyday to know what kind of quality or maintenance tasks they should do that day that are not directly production-related
4. Warehouse management system - 
We want to build a simple scannable barcode system and gps location map in our facility so we can scan before something is moved and scan location to save where it should go.

description:
Мы – начинающая команда и совсем недавно зашли с уникальным продуктом, который стал топ-1 в своей нише. Специализируемся на разработке чат-ботов, в частности это конструктор. Дополняется это все сквозной аналитикой, CRM системой, рассылками и живыми диалогами.

Наша команда распределенная, поэтому мы предлагаем удалённый формат работы.

-Активно участвовать во всех этапах разработки в составе scrum-команды: от сбора и анализа требований, до написания кода и релизных циклов;
-Создавать и поддерживать новые сервисы;
-Участвовать в Code Review и Performance Review, проводить модульное и интеграционное тестирования;
-Взаимодействовать с командой разработки: менеджером проекта, тестировщиками, UX/UI дизайнером, backend, frontend разработчиками.
Что нам необходимо:

Отличное знание Python 3.8;
Знание фреймворков Flask/ Django (DRF);
Опыт работы с SQL базами данных.
Знания Git
Будет плюсом, если у тебя есть:

Опыт работы с Docker, Docker-compose, drf, celery, redis, postgresql, nginx, gunicorn

Наш стэк технологий:

backend - django, drf, docker, docker-compose, celery, redis, postgresql, nginx, gunicorn
frontend - css, js(jquery and vanila), vue, nuxt, scss

Чем предстоит заниматься:
-Доработка нынешнего кода, исправления ошибок
-Доработка функционала по созданию воронок(условия, задержки, действия)
-Доработка сквозной аналитики
-Написание системы приема оплаты
-Доработка "живых диалогов", "рассылок"
-Разработка CRM системы для сервиса

Требования:
-Junior или Midle developer;
-Опыт работы с чат-ботами

Our goal is to make a full-scale chatbot builder that will allow you to create complex message chains on Instagram and Telegram with conditions, actions, and delays. All this is complemented by end-to-end analytics, a CRM system, mailing lists and live dialogues.

Our team shares, so we offer a remote work format.

We are looking for a cool Back-End

Duties
- Active participation in all developments as part of scrum teams: from collecting and distributing protection, to writing code and release cycles;
-Create and maintain new services;
-Participate in Code Review and Performance Review, conduct unit and integration testing;
-Interacts with the development team: project manager, testers, UX/UI designer, backend, frontend developers.
What we need:

Excellent knowledge of Python 3.8;
Knowledge of Flask/Django frameworks (DRF);
Experience with SQL databases.
Git knowledge
A plus if you have:

Experience with Docker, Docker-compose, drf, celery, redis, postgresql, nginx, gunicorn

backend — django, drf, docker, docker-compose, celery, redis, postgresql, nginx, gunicorn
interface - css, js (jquery and vanilla), vue, nuxt, scss

M3) Enhance: New parameter on existing APIs: Get article lon|lat for article details view and gift listings

title: Blockchain developer needed to create a digital sticker that can prove ownership and verification.
description:
THE PROJECT: I’m wanting to create a digital sticker (like the ones used on Instagram, tinder, etc) which can then be placed on an image or video. When clicked, the sticker will be able to show acceptance and proof of verification from another party. 

For example - Jim has an image/video that he wants to get verified by Bob. Jim sends a verification request to Bob for the image/video. Bob gives his approval. Now the image/video has the sticker of approval on it (from Bob’s consent) which, by clicking, Jim can now prove and show his friends (utilising some sort of hash key or zero knowledge protocol, etc) that Bob has verified his image/video. 

I want to then create a smooth step process whereby someone can upload an image/video, request approval and then show if the material has been verified or not (similar to when sending a friend request on Instagram - it’s either accepted or declined and you are notified when followed back). 

THE PURPOSE: Be able to show one party has accepted and approved a verification request from the other party, and be able to prove it to external viewers without giving vital info away that would make it easy to copy. 

ABOUT ME: I have a background in design however, coding is not my forte. I work for a tech startup, so I have a decent understanding of how dev teams work and what processes around creating a product involve.

title: Telegram Bot / Scraper / Mass DM / Shilling
description:
Front-End
1.	Web based Front-End which is going to be styled as Admin Dashboard.
2.	When entering the Admin Dashboard, in order to access the web, ID and PS must be required to provide. (to avoid anyone with the link using the app)
3.	Each Admin Dashboard Page described below must have its page within the dashboard. 

Back-End

Admin Dashboard Page N1 – Proxies
- - - - -
Store proxy details like: (1) address (2) port (3) username (4) password
Basically details that should be stored are the ones that Telegram needs to connect to proxy.
1.	This page has +ADD NEW button for adding new proxy
2.	Also there is a list of already added proxies as well on the page and data that is entered in each can also be edited if needed. (each entry also should have “Delete” button for removing it completely from the list)
3.	Each proxy entry should also have a data which shows how many TG accounts are registered on them.

Admin Dashboard Page N2 – Accounts
- - - - -
Create account and store data: (1) Name, (2) Last Name, (3) Username, (4) Phone, (5) Proxy
1.	This page has +ADD NEW button for registering new account and adding to the list
sms-activate.org API can be used for phone numbers.
2.	This page has list of already registered accounts. Following data: (1) Name, (2) Last Name, (3) Username, (5) Proxy, must be possible to be edited from the page for each account.
Note: in case of editing proxy it means to be able to select different proxy for the account from the list of proxies.
(each entry also should have “Delete” button for removing it completely from the list)
3.	In case account gets banned this information is important to be displayed here.
Note: Mass DM and Shilling operations must omit banned accounts.

Admin Dashboard Page N3 – Scraper
- - - - -
Text private message (DM) to number of preselected people.
1.	There must be a field where you paste Telegram Group/Channel link and hit SCRAPE button after which you will see all the members of that Group/Channel in a container (probably with a scroller within the container). The list must have checkboxes on the left in order to be able to unselect any user that you do not want to send the message to.
(Before hitting SCRAPE button there must be option to filter accounts: (1) only with usernames and (2) last online time. For example: (1) a checkbox “With Username” which if selected then the function only scrapes accounts with usernames and (2) type in field with dropdown box next to it, type in field for typing a number and dropdown for selecting Minutes/hours/days; if this field has typed in any number function will only scrape accounts that were last online corresponding time ago)
2.	There will be two options to do with these scraped users: (1) to send them DM message and (2) to add them to another group
3.	There also must be a field where you type the message that you want to text to these users that you scraped and left selected for the DM.
Note. When sending the link it must be visible in a Preview Form and not just only a clickable link.
Obviously there must be SEND button in the end for sending the message
Note: Nice touch would be to have popup asking if you are sure to send the message with “SEND” and “Cancel” buttons on it before actually sending it.
4.	Program must automatically use all the accounts evenly for sending the DMs. For example: if you have 60 people to send message to and you have 10 accounts, 6 messages should be sent from each of them. Same goes when adding scraped users to a group, they must be added evenly from all the accounts to lower the risk of them getting suspended.


Admin Dashboard Page N4 – Shilling Bot
- - - - -
Send message(s) in group(s) repeatedly with fixed/variable time intervals
1.	There must be a form with +ADD PROMO button at the end which adds entry to a list displaying all the ongoing promos.
2.	The form has following fields to fill (1) Telegram Group username, (2) Time interval in secs/minutes/hours which indicates the delay before repeatedly sending the message and lastly (3) The message.
3.	Once you hit +ADD PROMO button campaign is added to the list below the form. Every campaign within the list is ongoing which means that for every campaign in indicated groups, with indicated intervals, indicated messages are sent.
4.	Accounts bust be used consecutively for sending this messages to spread out the activity across all the accounts and avoid account bans as well as possible.
5.	Lastly within the list, each campaign must have END button that ends the campaign and automatically makes it disappear from the list.
Note: Nice touch would be to have popup asking if you are sure to end the campaign with “END” and “Cancel” buttons on it before actually ending it.


Please, check attached file for more understandable formatting of this text!

title: Mendix Reisbureau/Travel Agency
description:
Hey, For an assignment I need to build an app in Mendix. The app doesn't have to be too big and complicated. My question to you is can you build this app for me? The app is intended for a fictitious travel agency. I'm looking forward to your response!

Userstories:

As a Customer I want to be able to Request a Flight Booking (Create a Request)
As a Customer I would like to View my History of Previous Travel Requests
As a Travel Agent I would like to make a Provisional Booking Based on a Customer
As a Travel Agent I want to Send a Customer a Provisional Booking to Review
Stories and the WAP Revisited
As a Travel Agent I want to Receive an Error if there isn't Anymore Space on a Flight
As an Agent I want to Cancel All Provisional Bookings that have not been Accepted
As an Agent I want to Confirm Bookings Customers have Paid for so they don't Expire

Case:
Bounce Travel agency is a small travel agency that provides travel all over the world to major sporting events by air. As the numbers drop, they want to increase profits by attracting the younger crowd. To do this, they want to build an app that  
supports the process of requesting a trip online. At this point, a customer needs to call or visit the store to book a flight. The customer is assigned an agent who then goes through the itinerary with the customer. When the details of the trip are clear to the agent, he can look for suitable flights and select multiple flights. Alternatives are examined together with the customer, after which the flight can be booked.
  
To prevent a flight from being overbooked, an agent can make a provisional booking. The customer can then think about possible alternative flights. When a customer accepts a booking, the agent will confirm it after payment. Sometimes it takes a while for a customer to make a decision. The customer has a total of 5 days to make a decision, otherwise the agent will cancel the provisional booking. Because agents often have busy schedules, canceling overdue bookings is often forgotten. If the deadline is exceeded, this will result in a fine. In the app, all overdue bookings must therefore be canceled automatically by the system.  

In addition to making it easier for customers to access travel bookings, the system should also provide greater visibility into the status of their current and past requests. To make this possible, customers must be able to register with Bounce Travel Agency. In addition, this reduces Bounce's administration costs, as agents no longer have to process their customers' address details when booking a flight.

title: Automate Document Assessment Reports
description:
We provide clients with unique assessment feedback reports based on their profiles.

We have a legal CRM system, which collects their data, and generates eligibility scores.  With these scores we interpret a clients profile and send them a report based on their provide, its eligibility, and which viable program options they can consider.

Till now, this has been a manual process and we send an email as the report.  This takes time and is open to mistakes by the users generating the assessment reports.

What I am looking for is:

Someone to design us:

-  a smart assessment feedback report (visually)
-  a report that can be adapted based on selections to only present what applies
     - eg sections may apply to one client, but not another client
     - some clients are eligible, some are not, each need different feedback
-  a report that can be emailed to a client with a password protected pdf
-  a report that can extract data from a google sheet / or better from our CRM (via API) and place it into the report directly
- an inherent audit check that fact checks the data and report before sending it.
- a reporting function that provides statistics of assessments sent out, daily, weekly, monthly and yearly.

Our need is urgent as we are getting busier and busier and need to get some form of automation in place.

Open to suggestions for best practices.

Level 2 (14 questions): 
1 + 1, 1 + 2, 1 + 3, 2 + 2, 1 + 4, 2 + 3, 1 + 5, 2 + 4, 3 + 3, 1 + 9, 2 + 8, 3 + 7, 4 + 6, 5 + 5

title: Subscription based Crypto Trading Bot for Binance & Kucoin, Wallet system BEP20 & TRC20
description:
Crypto Trading Bot basic Documentation divided in two files that are attached here "KNP.xlsx" fundamentals & "Front.xlsx" for front-end

Spot Grid Automation that takes user's input from the interface on market price to lowest expected price & Total Investment as described in fundamental xlsx.

Cross margin connection will take into account Our provided server response of Symbol /price:, Order Expire time if not executed (oen:), weight:/  & will place orders accordingly user will only input preferable pairs from available symbols (can select multiple pairs at a time)

Isolated margin connection will take into account Our provided server response of Symbol /price:, Order Expire time if not executed (oen:), weight:/  & will place orders accordingly, user will only input preferable pairs from available symbols (can only select one pair at a time) - an pair activation and deactivation, Auto Borrow calculation/data, Auto repay calculation/data will be retrieved for the same user's connected Exchange account for calculation

for margin the system will send both long & short signals (buy/sell)

Wallet System based on BEP-20, TRC-20 Blockchain
Unique wallet address for both chains for every user when user signs up for new account

Both Deposit & Withdraw should support on both chains
A log file should be create for both chain wallets to record to log output when our system creates a new wallet for user that contains on chain wallet access
A withdraw system from our HOT wallets on user's 2FA verification

for withdrawal & Deposit only KNP token supported (Custom Contract for BEP20 & TRC20) will be provided by us when it is required
other wallet related details are provided in the attached files.

2FA user verification is must for withdrawal

Isolated Margin, Cross Margin | Exchange APIs Binance & Kucoin | Wallet system Centeralised BEP20 & TRC20 | Multi user Subscription System (SaaS) | Multi-level Referral Payout as mentioned in KNP

All the referral income (mentioned in the KNP.xlsx) will be deposited  to referrers account in an instant whenever transaction happens.

Project will scale to multiple servers according to user flow.

If you are happy to comply, we can share the job description in detail. We want someone who can build our Augmented Reality section of our product using smart lenses. We really need someone who understands the wearable AR space. An example would be if X moves, then the sporting field lines on the ground would in turn move with X. That is just the beginning. We have teamed up with major clubs in this sport and player and sponsors of their global brands who want to get behind this project. So as Wilkitude is the leading eyewear AR platform, we thought that would be a good space to start to look for an expert who can drive a team to build out the application in stages with the Utopian Vision in mind. Of course we expect a lot of iterations along the way as we ourselves understand the capabilities of the platform. If any candidate strongly believes their is a better platform or custom solution for our company, we are open to ideas. The candidate must be open minded. Have a passion for the sport. A passion for AR. They must also share the vision of the company. The board have allocated up to a 2.5% dilution of their shares for this candidate, who’s role is to bring all our months of mechanical and industrial engineering and associated patent pending and “game changing” tech / engineering to life with a Wikitude OR ALIKE  platform. the successful candidate must be dynamic and on the edge of this space. A forward thinker, have the ability to think outside the square and beyond! The candidate will not only initially bring the MVP alive, but also present their own ideas and help build and grow a team of technology experts to create the Utopian System we desire. Anyone short of being able to achieve the above need not apply. We believe that you create with the future in mind. So only someone highly passionate about this space with a genuine desire to earn significant amounts of money if KPI’s are hit, need apply. To find out more please send me your company name, full name, Country, ZIP or Postal Code for me to send a 2 x page mutual NDA, in order to show you the technology and discuss the role in detail. I look forward to interviewing experts in AR developers who have designed operating systems for eyewear / lenses companies in the past.

Shipping options such as choice of courier and pick-up point (no home adress) will be shown to the buyer at checkout. When payment is completed, the shipping label must be shown to the seller to be affixed to the package and the tracking number sent to the buyer. The shipping label must be emailed to the seller and notified on his account, while the buyer must view the tracking number on his account. After 8 days that the item has not been sent, the amount paid will be returned to the buyer. In the event that the item is found to be defective, the refund will have to be handled manually by us.
The search criteria and all data will be entered by us (including the purchase commission).

For make this marketplace we can use Dokan for Woocommerce with integrated modules of Stripe and Shipstation . If something of description is not possible to do, let me know before starting work to find alternative solutions. 
The price $499 for Dokan it's purchased by me.
Thanks in advantage!

title: Firebase project bug fixing
description:
Last year I had some help building a simple Firebase app that consists of the following:


Page 1). login.html.  User can sign in or create an account. This is done via Firebase authentication. The options I have are Basic (requires sign up) or Google account. 

Page 2). Index html. Once signed in, there's a simple card/div that confirms the user's email address, name, role and report, which is pulled from the Realtime database that contains the user's details.

When a new user is created either via the basic user sign up or the first time a Google user signs in, they are automatically assigned a default role and report. (Please see attached screenshot that shows the structure of the reports list that I had)

The app is no longer working and it may be due to the expiration of credentials on my Firebase account. I'm not sure, but I need someone who is familiar with Firebase and JS to help me sort this. 

There is nothing in my Realtime database anymore so it may have been wiped. The authentication still seems to be working but I think the app is having difficulty communicating with the database.

-Lipa na Mpesa online Mpesa Express payments.
-Paybill direct payments from website
-Transaction and account status queries reversals and reconciliations

(1) The current integration on B2C shows success, but cash is not withdrawn from user account. Therefore, the first task is to work with MongoDB, EJS, and node to ensure when user makes a withdrawal from their account, the same amount of cash is withdrawn from their user account.

(3) I need a statement where all the transactions are listed: B2C, C2B, and all other related M-Pesa transaction. Any transactions by customer has to be listed on statement.

Please apply with ready relevant examples of above experience

We are looking for someone who can test our NFT platform which currently runs on testnet. The purpose is to see if buying NFTs from our content creators is working well on different devices. iOS, android and desktop. All needs to be recorded, so we can easily replicate bug or inconsistencies. Also the mistakes need to be logged so our developers can fix things. And when a flow works, we need a good video of the working flow so first time users can understand how to use the platform.

The following things needs to be done:

There are a lot of different scenarios in terms to payment tokens and wallets. We currently support payments in BNB, USDC, PRT, ETH (all on testnets) and we support Metamask and Binance chain wallet browser wallets and Trustwallet and Metamask mobile wallets. Trustwallet and Metamask mobile wallets can also be used with the website on a desktop by scanning the QR code. So, all in all this gives quite a number of permutations.

We are looking for someone with experience of testing Blockchain apps using testnet.

title: Mobile Web App Tender
description:
Introduction
This document is designed to provide a simple brief of an App that can be used on a Smart Phone, Tablet, Laptop and a Desktop. It will help Energy Consultants to carry out an assessment via technology and not have to write anything down with a pen and paper. The software will record their journey around the premises and allow the Energy Consultant to evidence his assessment. There will not be a full report prepared 
from this only an Appendix which will be created in Word to insert into a full report.
The system needs to be able to recall the reports by date and name with the user being able to document and edit the report afterwards in the comfort of his office, in a coffee shop or in their home. We would like the report to be co-branded with company but the user can select their own logo and their own details. An Example report is within this document.

The user will have a user interface. Where they will select ‘Location’ and ‘Subject’ he will be able to take two photographs for the report with additional photos going into the Appendix. Once report has been completed additional editing can be done to change photos and put notes together for appendix. 
The reports will need to stay available on the server with the option of a company login so reports can be shared to each user.

• External

title: Build a gamified social polling mobile app with android that rewards users
description:
Looking for an experienced android/flutter developer who can either work on the existing app (link below the description) using android OR develop the app from scratch with flutter. The app is a social polling app where users get 1 point for every question they answer. Once the user collects 100 points, some money is given to charity. The app will have the following features/screens:

- App onboarding with 3-4 screens
- Signup screen (social login with Facebook & Google)
- Signin screen for users who have logged out
- Interests screen where users can choose from a set of interested topics e.g. brands, habits, politics, sports, financial markets, etc up to 12 topics
- Poll/Quiz screen with image/video, question(text), 4 choices (text buttons), a 10 second timer (after which user can answer the question), #Interest tag
- Feed screen containing feeds of swipeable images with shareable button
- User profile screen which shows how many points they have won
- Impact screen which shows how much money has been donated to charity by the crowd
- Add question screen where users can add their own question, add image/video, add 4 choices, add no. of responses wanted (e.g 50 or 100), add money (this will also work as an admin panel for admin to add questions )
- Client dashboard screen where users who have added questions can see the poll results (this feature can also be included in the User profile screen)

I am also sharing a link to the app for reference - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sarnava.crowdwise

title: KuCoin WebSocket Order book
description:
I have integration all of the API but I have only an issue which is to build the correct order book.

Here is the full documentation to build a level 2 order book.
https://docs.kucoin.com/futures/#level-2-market-data

Calibration procedure：

1. After receiving the websocket Level 2 data flow, cache the data.
2. Initiate REST Level 2 snapshot request to get the snapshot data of Level 2 order book.
3. Playback the cached Level 2 data flow.
4. Apply the new Level 2 data flow to the local snapshot to ensure that the sequence of the new Level 2 update lines up with the sequence of the previous Level 2 data. Discard all the message prior to that sequence, and then playback the change to snapshot.
5. Update the Level 2 full data based on the sequence according to the size. If the size equals to 0, you can update the sequence and remove the price of which the size is 0 out of Level 2. For other cases, please update the price and size.
6. If the sequence of the newly pushed message does not line up to the sequence of the last message, you could pull through REST Level 2 message request to get the updated messages. Please note that the difference between the start and end parameters cannot exceed 500.

The change property of Level 2 updates is a string value of "price,size,sequence". Please note that size is the updated size at that price Level. A size of "0" indicates that the price Level can be removed.

After the Api building order book upon receiving the Level 2 market data, should be able to return current bid/ask price as well as the size of order.

title: Shopify Flow Creation (with Liquid Variables)
description:
I need a Shopify Flow creating. It needs some work with Liquid code to write variables and insert using the add variable link in Flow.

Orders not fulfilled within 48 hours of being placed should have the order tag LATE applied to them.

The 48 hours period needs to EXCLUDE Saturdays and Sundays. 


%A - is the full weekday name
https://www.shopify.co.uk/partners/blog/liquid-date-format
https://shopify.github.io/liquid/filters/date/


Examples:

An order placed at 9am on Monday would be tagged as LATE at 9am on Wednesday if it is unfulfilled.

An order placed at 9am on Friday would be tagged as LATE at 9am on Tuesday if it is unfulfilled.

We will likely have follow up tasks once this first part is complete e.g. customising the time period based on the sales channel.

title: ESP32 Firmware for IOT Product
description:
Need robust ESP32 firmware for an IoT consumer product.

Hardware/PCB -- ESP32 WROOM 32
Firmware -- ESP32 Native C code
IOT Cloud -- AWS IoT Cloud

The controller will have multiple modules which it will be controlling:
- relay On/off
- RGB 5050 LED - On/off, colour, brightness, blink rate
- WS2812 LED (upto 1000 LEDs x 60 frames/sec) - same as RGB but at individual LED level
- touch sensor - will respond to different patterns - 1 tap = event 1, 2 tap = event 2, etc

System should interface with AWS IoT for:
- automatic provisioning
- sync local clock
- message delivery and shadowing for driving actions for each module connected
- have option to queue multiple events for scheduled execution locally 
- OTA updates

Other features:
- wifi provisioning using Android App - unified provisioning, etc
- fall back to last known firmware in case of failed update/boot loop detection

Vendor scope will include to prototyping using already available hardware and firmware testing with AWS. 

Refer to file for detailed specifications

title: Hiking trails explorer
description:
We are developing a web platform that will enable us to bring the hiking trails closer to our users.

The user will have the opportunity to choose the trail from the catalog or to perform database filtering based on some parameters such as:
- trail weight
- the region where the trail is located
- state type
- trail duration...

After selecting a particular trail, the user will be acquainted with the layout of the trail, its description and technical information. In addition, there will be an option to explore the environment, such as objects near the trail that might be of interest to some pedestrian like:
- restaurants and accommodation,
- sights,
- mountain lodges…

In addition to the trails themselves, the user is also able to explore landscapes and regions. Within each of the regions, the landscapes within it will be presented, as well as the trails it encompasses.

In addition to these two key things related to the integration of the ArcGIS platform, the portal will contain a blog in which the user will be introduced to the basics of hiking and will also contain a section with advices from more experienced colleagues, section with information of the portal and section with frequently asked questions and useful links.

The portal will be bilingual, Serbian and English.

https://projects.invisionapp.com/share/H212AAZO6K7A#/screens/463376905

title: Website coder to pull url parameters into clickfunnels
description:
Subject: We are using vidalytics to track viewers of a video posted on a clickfunnels website.

With that being said, the issue we need solving is getting correct code on a clickfunnels website which allows us to pull the email from the "?email=xyzemail@gmail.com" part from a url like this www.awesomeurl.com?email=xyzemail@gmail.com so that we can ultimately zap that info into a crm to send out email blasts based on how long someone has watched the video.
The problem we are facing currently is we have code which will pull an email from the cache to do such a thing BUT since we are not using a traditional funnel to get the email and are instead sending people an initial link to their email with the format above which contains their email in the url (so we can track it on the clickfunnels page), the email never ends up being in the cache and simply hangs out up the url.
We need someone to write us the correct header/footer/etc. code so that we can pull an email from the url so that we can drop that info into the CRM along with how long someone has watched the video on a page so that we can send emails out based on time watched.

Note: We already have a zapier integration setup which will send in data based on how long someone has watched.  We're just missing matching that up with the email of the user who is watching.

title: Applescript/Automator - Loop through CSV and copy web image to photoshop
description:
I'm looking for a fairly simple AppleScript to automate some workflow for me using 4 apps: 
- Numbers/CSV
- Finder 
- Google Chrome 
- Adobe Photoshop 

Here's what I'd like to automate: 

Loop through a CSV of filenames in numbers (or just the CSV file - up to you) and for each line: 
1. Copy the file name 
2. Find that file in a directory called 'for_print' 
3. Open that file in Photoshop 
4. Switch to chrome and append that filename from the CSV to a URL and load the image. 5. Copy the image from chrome 
6. Switch to photoshop 
7. Paste the image on the file we just opened 
8. Flatten image/merge layers 
9. Save & Close the file 

Here is a video example showing me doing this process manually: https://streamable.com/r76aaj I

f you have any more questions, do let me know :) 

Thanks Adam

title: Need 1 people to build an API - Lambda Function (8 hours) : REPOSTED
description:
Delivery Deadline: 8 Hours

We have a lot of APIs to build. There are many more opportunities to help us meet our super tight deadline.

TLDR:
Build a lambda function in NodeJS that has an API using API Gateway. It takes a file as input, encrypts the file using a Public Key, saves it to S3, and then returns a 200 Status with the Files URL.

POST File Description
1. Your lambda function should take a file and then encrypt the file using a public Key.
2. Generate a UUID and save a record to a DynamoDB Table called “LookUp” that just contains id & name for each of the “values” (The goal here is to use UUIDs as the file name so that we’re not storing the file with its original name.
3. The encrypted file should be uploaded to S3
4. The URL for the encrypted file should be returned with a 200 API response.

GET File Description
1. User makes GET request to API and requests a specific file using the file’s name (The UUID we requested earlier). The function grabs the file from S3, then uses a Private Key on the backend to decrypt the file. The decrypted file is then passed to the frontend with a 200 response and the original file name (Get the original file name from the lookup table)

How to get the job
1. You can complete this in the next 8 hours.
2. You have experience working with S3, DynamoDB, Lambda, NodeJS.

You should be familiar with the following

NodeJS
AWS Lambda
AWS Step Functions
DynamoDB
AWS SQS
AWS SQS-SLQ
AWS SNS

You will need to answer why and how you are going to accomplish this.

Looking to build long term relationships with experts and if we enjoy your work, we are launching 180+ apps in the next 12 months that can use your expertise to create additional modular lambda functions. This job is a test of your capabilities, if you perform well we will provide you with an abundance of work.

Muso Keys is currently instrument agnostic which allows the user to play and learn on the go. We are currently moving into Beta phase and now looking at implementing sound recognition into our app so users can play with their real instrument the piano.

We are looking for someone that has experience with sound data, C# and a plus if familiar with unity. This task is to specifically create sound recognition technology for our app to accurately pick up the note pitches from an acoustic piano and read them successfully through our app without any cables. We would need to pick up multiple notes at one time (polyphonic) and also in real time so there would not be any delay.

please note in order to work with out developer you will need to have experience in C# and a bonus if experienced in Unity as well.

We would love to hear from you as this has the potential to be on going work for the right candidate 

feel free to search this technology that has been successfully implemented from other apps such as simply piano and yousician. 

Thanks,
Team Muso

title: Develop two approximation techniques to solve instances of the Single Allocation p-Hub Location Prob
description: Develop two approximation techniques to solve a number of instances of the aforementioned problem. title: OAuth expert needed to pull in data from Google Sheets API in PHP

From what I can tell, it's the OAuth part that's missing.  I need a PHP script that automatically authenticates and gets a new token so that it can pull from the Google Sheets API all the time without expiring and breaking the flow.

I've been through this tutorial:  https://developers.google.com/sheets/api/quickstart/php, which worked fine until the token expired.  This needs to be a web-page that connects, as opposed to a command-line script.

I can provide you access to all these accounts and the spreadsheet and API keys and FTP access to the server. (which runs on Amazon AWS bitnami on Lightsail)

title: Solana Validator Landing Page Design
description:
Hello! We would like to create a landing page for my company's Solana Validator Service.

Please review this mockup webpage put together with Webflow: https://serum-state.webflow.io/

The service we are providing is similar to mining Bitcoin. This however is specific for the Solana Blockchain and works a little differently. More detail on how it works here: https://solana.com/validators

We want to demonstrate that we offer a secure and institutional grade service, so the landing page design could look and feel very clean and modern. For example: https://chain.link/

Here are some examples of others providing the same service:
https://chorus.one/networks/solana/
https://www.alphapro.io/

We are open to any other suggestions and like your portfolio so open to design ideas. The logo used is our own design and can be used commercially.

2 asks:
- Design a clean landing page. This should include everything from, graphics fonts (big fans of typewriter style fonts). There should be a lot of whitespace for the landing page and background should be white.
- The logo is attached. We would like to use this logo, but if you could re-create some variations of this same logo in different sizes (white, black etc) with the name 'SolanaState' and logo by itself. Essentially we want a folder with 'brand assets' we can use. 

Note: The landing page should be very clean / simple. No over the top designs, not too many gradients or colours.

title: Java backend developer
description:
Java Backend Developer
Primary Job Focus: Information Technology
Employment Type: Full Time
Experience: Experienced
Salary: €25000 - €27000 per year (Rs.1,70,000 - 1,92,000 per month approximately)
Application Deadline: February 25, 2022
Location: Malta, Europe (officially known as the Republic of Malta)
Cost of Living in Malta: Approximately 1 Lakh Rupees per month for a couple sharing
a small apartment in a non-prime location.
Malta - A Brief Introduction: Malta is a republic island in the Mediterranean, has been a
member of the European Union since 2004 and also forms part of the Schengen Area
since 2007. Besides having one of the strongest economies, the lowest unemployment
rates and one of the world’s best climates, Malta offers excellent schooling, healthcare
and an overall safe environment. Malta boasts a Mediterranean climate with more than
300 days of sunshine and a top-ranked healthcare system which has consistently been
ranked among the top five in the world by the World Health Organization. As Malta once
was a part of the British colony, the majority of locals are articulate in the English
language, so interacting and blending in would be easier.
Details: Our client, one of the major players in the gaming industry, is recruiting a Java
Backend Developer to join their growing team! Working closely with various
stakeholders in different locations globally, you will be responsible for building and
maintaining a state of the art gambling site! Working on the company's main platform,
you will be responsible for:
● Carrying out integrations with external systems
● Developing internal components and subsystems
● Carrying out any Frontend development as necessary
● Developing and implementing new features
● Working in an agile methodology
● Carrying out any other ad-hoc tasks as necessary
Experience:
● Relevant qualifications in Software development, Computer Science or the
Equivalent
● 3 years of experience in a similar role
● Experience with web application/service development
● SQL Knowledge is a must
● Experience in Tomcat, Maven, Spring, MongoDB, Guava, Guice, MySQL, Nginx,
Linux, Jenkins, and GIT is considered a plus
● Excellent command of the English language
Skills:
● Analytical and problem-solving approach
● Team player but able to work alone
● Ability to prioritize time accordingly and meet deadlines
● Excellent communication skills
● Ability to communicate information in both a technical and non-technical manner
● Conscientious

title: Wordpress Plugin Development
description:
Hello,
I'm requiring a WordPress plugin to be developed for a website I'm building.
I have attached a PDF with a mock UI. The plugin can vary from my drawing.

The plugin must allow the user to [select a MONTH & YEAR] and [choose an item]. The plugin will then output the [value of the items for the chosen MONTH & YEAR in relation to the value of bitcoin]. 

For example, if I select January 2010 and a Pizza. The plugin will display how many pizzas (whole pizza or 1/2 pizza) I could buy with one bitcoin from the date selected.

The output window will be a popup window as per the UI drawing.

The plugin must have the ability to import historic bitcoin value data (from 2009 to current) and calculate the value of bitcoin in comparison to an item e.g. a pizza, can of coca-cola, car.

To apply for this job, you must include the words I like pizza or your application will be deleted and not considered.

If you think you can help with this plugin I'd be interested in talking with you.

title: Dockerfile for complete webapp DevOps
description:
Basic docker application

 

Note: For docker images you may use anything that is available on docker hub. You may use the original images or build new images based on the originals as you see fit.

 

1.1 Simple web page

 

Create a docker image based on nginx which will serve a very simple web page. The contents of the page should be “Hello welcome to webapp”.

Secure the web app with HTTP basic auth. Add a user named admin with password adminpass.

 

1.2 Access logs to MongoDB

 

Each access to the page should result in the creation of a new document in the MongoDB collection named access. We want to save the user agent string, the date of the access and the response code.

 

1.3 Notifications

 

Let's assume we want to be notified when the access was denied more than 10 times total, e.g. because the user entered the wrong password. Create a script that counts the number of access denials and sends an email to some address (you can send it to yourself for testing) if that number is above 10.

 

Note: the email might be rejected or marked as spam on the receiving end. Why would that happen and how could you mitigate it? (It's not necessary to fix this now since it might take up too much time, so just tell us what you would do.)

 

The access-denied counter script should be run periodically. Create an image that runs the script once every 20 minutes.

 

1.4 docker-compose file

 

Create a docker-compose file that manages the entire application described above. Running docker-compose up should start everything.


You need to provide detailed description of each part

title: looking for Ninja trader Bot builder C+
description:

I also want a buy only button for a up direction meaning every upward cross it will take a trade. and then a sell button as well for shorts on crossovers. also have the ATM where we can chose the lot s and TP STOP and we can move it after the bot enters the trade. Please don't take this small job if your not familiar with this kind of set up. Thank you

Update & Clarification
Currently we have 3 strategies; 1 for both Buy and Sell entry condition. 1 for Buy Only for to use in an uptrend, and 1 for Sell Only to use in downtrend..  All 3 bots currently have adjustable inputs for target profit 1 &2, stop loss, and Auto Breakeven with offset.  

Our primary goal is to have someone helps us to add an ATM strategy to these bots with adjustable inputs in the strategy setting.  The ATM strategy should executed upon the Buy or Sell conditions.  This should be able for us to drag the Stop Loss, or Target Profit on the chart as desired, rather than the fixed Target/Stoploss that the bot would not allow us to adjusted once the trade is executed.

    - Text field: Input a address
    - Button: when press it calls the grpc function for that ip address
- When you receive a message
    - Alert with message and the address coming from
- Message sender can get the response and show in a alert
    
    

The protobuf file triggered can just be the basic "hello world" one.

### Some libraries that might be useful:

- https://github.com/teamairship/react-native-public-ip
- https://github.com/Mitch528/react-native-grpc

description:
Full Job Description
Our creative agency is hiring a website designer / developer with Word Press, HTML, Shopify / Big Commerce and seo expertise, among others, to assist with various word press and e-comm website needs including development and design and seo optimization, among other website and social media related platform needs. This is a part-time, ongoing job opportunity to both develop and launch and then manage various websites and platform initiatives.

We will help provide creative vision as to the website development and goals for our website and marketing / SEO objectives. You provide the know-how and expertise re implementation / functionality, current best-practices, development, design, seo etc.
What You Will Do

· Design and scope websites to assist in proposal development

· Develop custom websites in Shopify platform for new clients

· Maintain existing Shopify sites for clients by adding new products, apps, forms or other enhancements as the client’s offerings grow

· Participate in multiple projects simultaneously

· Collaborate with content developers and graphic designers

What You Will Need

The ideal candidate will have a demonstrated working knowledge of Shopify and the various apps that are available for add-ins to supplement is functionality for specific purposes. Please do not respond if you do not have specific experience in Shopify. We will require samples of your work for you to be considered.

You will also need:

· Consistent availability for 10 – 40 hours per week

· Being responsive anytime M-F between 9:00 – 6:00 Eastern Time, occasional weekend

· Fluent English speaking, reading and writing (doesn't need to be your native language)

· Previous remote or office work experience is a must

· Being fine with doing manual and repetitive tasks when necessary

title: Full-stack Developer Needed to Build Responsive Service Website and Mobile Apps
description:
Service Website and Mobile Apps

Executive Summary
We are looking for a full-stack developer or, preferably, a software development company to architect, design, and build a responsive service website and mobile Apps on the Microsoft Azure platform. The site and app will provide the “Users” (service requesters/recipients) the ability to find or select the type of service they want from a list of available services offered and post the job request within their desirable demographic area. In response, “Providers” (service providers/contractors) will be able to respond to the job request based on their location and the type of service rendered by the provider. Both the users and providers should be able to register on the site using their basic biodata information and some additional key registration requirements for legal, regulatory, and financial purposes, as applicable. The website must be responsive, and the mobile apps must be Android and iOS compatible. Both the website and mobile Apps will have the capability to receive and process the payment on behalf of the user and provider using a designated payment processor through their application programming interface and gateway. 
There will be three intertwined core functionalities/modules to be developed:
(1)	User (requester) interface
(2)	Provider (contractor) interface
(3)	Management interface
Specific deliverables include:
(1)	Architectural and technical design 
(2)	Wireframes, graphics and visual design
(3)	Technical specification document
(4)	Back-end Microsoft Azure infrastructure design and implementation
(5)	Responsive front-end web development
(6)	Android and Mobile Apps
(7)	Maintenance and user documentation 
Requirements:
(1)	Must be a full-stack development company or developer with several years of experience using Microsoft software development technologies, JavaScript, web design/development, angular, HTML, MS SQL, and so on.
(2)	Android and iOS Mobile App development 
(3)	Payment integration via web and mobile apps 
(4)	Will be required to sign an NDA
You will be asked to answer the following questions when submitting a proposal:
1.	Describe your recent experience with similar projects
2.	Include a link to your profile or website
3.   Provide a link to three sample projects of similar requirements and complexity

title: Expert Windows C# WPF developer for ongoing Project
description:
Job description
We’re looking for an expert C# WPF Windows developer to join our team building a client-side UI application. 
# C# WPF for the UI
# Integration testing protocols
# Unit testing protocols 

There are several professional developers on the team already. You’d join the team to build great products faster.

Things we value:
# Top quality. Delight our users.
# Clean code: it must be easy to understand, test, extend and maintain for multiple people over many years.
# Efficient dev workflows.
# All requirements must be tested automatically, all suites must run with every push, and finish within 15 minutes.
# All builds are automated on a CI system.

For this role, we’re looking specifically for the following skills:
# Expert C#
# Expert WPF
# Expert in implementing Integration/Unit Testing Protocols.
# Attention to detail: be able to implement features as documented. Get clarification early, ask questions.
# Communication skills: you’re working remotely. This means that communication is harder. Be able to communicate over chat - ask for phone calls when needed.
# Nice to have: clear understanding of the Windows networking stack.

About us and how we work:
# 2-week sprints, Jira, branch-based development, we do code-reviews before any code is merged to master.
# Globally distributed team. We communicate by slack, skype, github, Jira, and email.
# Our product management and design team provides clear requirements-documents that describe exactly what the user should experience, including pixel-perfect screenshots and developer-friendly source graphics.

Project phases:
1) We’ll provide a few pre-screen questions to qualified bidders.
2) Then we’ll award a “paid trial period” to up to 3 bidders. This will be a block of 40 hours where you work on specific features or bug-fixes in our existing code-base. Show us your code-quality, speed of development, and how you work as part of a team.
3) If that goes well, we hope to make you a long-term member of our team.

In your bid, please:
1) Briefly describe your level of experience with each of the desired skills listed above.
2) Also indicate your level of experience with Windows drivers and C++ (those skills are optional but nice to have)
3) If possible, point us to an example of your work with WPF (if publicly available)
4) State your timezone, when you’d typically work, and by when you could potentially wind down your other projects so you could be on our team full-time.

Thank you for your time, we look forward to seeing your bids.

title: Multiple Rails Tasks
description:
There are various tasks or features to change in my Rails app, and work on front end and back end are necessary. Here are the tasks:
- Currently, the items table has a trash can icon that can be clicked, and modal comes up asking for deletion. Instead of trash can icon, change it to a pencil icon and make modal allow entering a field for bin number. Clicking "Save" in the modal will save the custom field (basically the logic in Orgs::ImportCustomFieldsController)
- On the items table, it currently paginates and has page number. Change this to only have previous and next buttons, and logic will be similar to ActivityLogsController#index, where it doesn't perform a count nor use offset for the SQL under the hood. This uses jQuery Datatables, and there is a post here that may help in changing the UI portion. https://datatables.net/forums/discussion/52175/pagination-without-using-offsets
- User activity log currently shows when people create or delete a cycle count. Add logging for when cycle count properties change.
- An admin can add users to the org, but they cannot specify default location. Add functionality to select default location in a new column that is a drop down menu. Default location (location ID) should be stored in the user's custom data. Make sure that when users log in, this default location is used if one is specified. Users can switch locations, and this is saved via cookie, so just use the cookie if it's there, otherwise use the default location specified.
There will likely be more work if you do a good job. If unsatisfactory performance with first milestone, I will end contract for subsequent milestones.

title: Need to update a Visual Studio 10 Plugin to work in VS2019/22
description:
Background:

The code was last updated in 2011 which means it probably needs VS10. Unfortunately the installer checks to see if VS10 (or possibly earlier) is installed and fails to install if not. Seems VS12 is oldest installer still on their site. If install is successful, it also installs the source code.

2) Get codebase to compile under .Net 4.7.2 and .Net 6
3) Upgrade the VSIX code, etc. to create VSIXs for VS2019 and VS2022

Solution consisting of the above code that will compile under .Net 4.72 in VS19 and VS22 and under .Net 6 in VS22

title: Create user managment dashboard nodejs and pm2
description:
Registration

Currently we are running a software business where we sell software services to Companies here in Germany. 

The software is like an aftermarket addition to X (We call X just for security purpose)

When a company wants to register with us we need to collect the following items from them.

- Login Details (E-Mail and Password for X)
- Company Name

With those informations we will do the following

1. Create a new telegram bot for the company (BotFahter)
2. Create a new subdomain for that company and those into the nginx config
3. Create a certificate for ssl for that subdomain
4. Create a new node instance for telegram for that company
5. Add company details and subdomain to main server (running puppeteer)
6. Start telegram instance 
7. Start puppeteer new instance. 

I will be setting up a meeting with you and showing you the process of adding a new company to the system.

What we want is a kind of a dashboard where we can manage and add the new companies and all those steps are automated instead we doing them all over again as they are really time consuming and not very portable (for example adding a new company from a phone or tablet)

You should know what node.js is what linux is as those are the main things used here. 

Telegram bot API Keys, PM2 shouldn’t be unknown for you. 

Please if you offer is higher than the budget in the project, do not offer.

description:
Our client, the leader in the pest control industry, is looking for Software Engineers. Their SDEs are relied on to build the future of their direct-to-home service delivery platform.

As a part of their Engineering department, this role requires the ability to move quickly, think deeply and work well with others on your Agile Scrum team: engineers, UX, product owners, and stakeholders. As a Senior Software Engineer, you will engineer, code, and test resilient, highly-scalable software systems for both their web applications as well as backend APIs for their mobile apps servicing their hundreds of thousands of customers. They are significantly building out the engineering teams and are seeking talented coders who love growth to be a part of this expansion.

About the client: They have been setting the standard for direct-to-home services technology for nearly 7 years and continue to lead innovation in an industry that provides services to hundreds of thousands of residents across the United States. People who come to work at the company are straight-talking, forward-thinking, hard workers who come together both to collaborate and to have a good time.

Responsibilities include:
● Designing and building mobile applications for Apple’s iOS platform.

● Publishing application on App Store.
● Maintaining the code and atomization of the application.
● Designing and implementing application updates.

Location
The client is open to consider well qualified candidates working remotely within the USA mainland.
Candidates will be expected to support teams working in different time zones throughout the USA.
All candidates will be expected to work remotely at times, so they will need to have a suitable working environment with robust internet connectivity
Job requirements
